member.name: IInitializeWithStream.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes a handler with a stream.
member.param: A pointer to an interface that represents the stream source.

param.name: grfMode
param.para: One of the following STGM values that indicates the access mode for pstream.
The stream indicated by pstream is read-only.
The stream indicated by pstream is read/write accessible.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IInitializeWithStream
member.summary: Exposes a method that initializes a handler, such as a property handler, thumbnail handler, or preview handler, with a stream.
